product_name: Sierra Designs Badlands Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and waterproof, the Sierra Designs Badlands Jacket is convenient to keep in your car, pack or anywhere else that's within easy reach when it starts to drizzle. Lightweight nylon fabric with waterproof, breathable coating blocks rain while letting body heat escape so you don't overheat; seams are fully taped. Generous zippered front pockets are big enough to store gloves, a beanie and other essentials; interior chest pocket keeps valuables secure. The Sierra Designs Badlands Jacket features a back mesh vent for enhanced breathability. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and waterproof, the Sierra Designs Badlands Jacket is convenient to keep in your car, pack or anywhere else that's within easy reach when it starts to drizzle.
